评论详情: I'm returning this dress to size up , but I'll go ahead and write a review.  The material is great- nice and thick and it's even a little stretchy. The dress is VERY form fitting, though. I ordered my normal size of medium the first time. It fit, but I didn't like the way it looked on ME. Sent it back and ordered a Large. Just tried that on and that also fit and fit well, but I still feel like I need to go one more size up. If that doesn't work, I'll just assume the dress isn't made for me and pick something else. It's really pretty and comfortable, though. If I can figure out how, I'll come back and do an update after I get the 3rd one.

These dresses are well made and durable. Though they need a stitch, or something, to hold the facing down around the inside of the neck. We had to wash them after every performance due to stage chalk that got on them, but they held up to washing every well. I would advise drying on a cool setting.  Would buy again.

评论概述: Belt too long….. but dress is fabulous!!!!
评论详情: This dress will fit well and look beautiful on anybody!  Shapewear will make you look even better ! I bought the red nautical dress.  Nice fabric with stretch and a smooth zipper quality.  And my only complaint (and it seems all other companies have the same problem) is why is the belt so long? There are a lot of holes to notch the belt, but the holes are in the wrong place. I had to punch in an extra hole since the other holes were too loose around my waist which left a lot of belt I had to tuck in halfway around me! Maybe I will take the belt to an alternation shop to cut off 1/3 of the length. I am not even that skinny with a 27 inch waist!

This was the most comfortable dress! I’m very chesty 36 DDD, bubble butt, and I have a belly. I was looking online for a dress to wear to a 50’s 60’s dance.
